channel.title: Run won't work
channel.description:
[b]I downloaded this source and client. http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,564470.0.html The client runs perfectly.
But whenever i click the Run. on the source its open for a split second and closes. http://prntscr.com/g4dpm ^That is what i says.
I'm just now trying to start coding, and i need to know if i need to do anything in the start. Help?
This is my run code @echo off title Economize Source "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_03\bin\javac.exe" -Xmx -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server exit
and i've also tried changing the "exit" to "pause" and it still didn't work..
Also, I'm going to make a development team, and if you'd like to join add my msn. -Br0k22@yahoo.com[/b]
Someone help me, i'm such a noob at this stuff..

item.title: Run won't work
item.dc:creator: @enjoiiii enjoiiii
item.description:
@enjoiiii wrote:

Uhm, Explain to me over this thread.

item.title: Run won't work
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

You need to change javac to java, you don’t use the compiler to run your code.

Read full topic

item.title: Run won't work
item.dc:creator: @enjoiiii enjoiiii
item.description:
@enjoiiii wrote:

[b]I downloaded this source and client. http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,564470.0.html
The client runs perfectly.

But whenever i click the Run. on the source its open for a split second and closes.

Lightshot

Screenshot

Captured with Lightshot


^That is what i says.

I’m just now trying to start coding, and i need to know if i need to do anything in the start.
Help?

This is my run code
@echo off
title Economize Source
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_03\bin\javac.exe” -Xmx -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server
exit

and i’ve also tried changing the “exit” to “pause” and it still didn’t work…

Also, I’m going to make a development team, and if you’d like to join add my msn.
-Br0k22@yahoo.com[/b]

Someone help me, i’m such a noob at this stuff…
